title: Add Javadoc on field in Type Hierarchy does nothing
OB: When attempting to add Javadoc on a field in the Type Hierarchy view, nothing happens.
EB: After selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view and choosing to add Javadoc, the Javadoc should be successfully added to the selected field.
SR:
1. Open the Type Hierarchy view.
2. Select a field in the view.
3. Attempt to add Javadoc on the selected field.
4. Verify that the Javadoc is successfully added and visible on the field.
